content: अतिपत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Going beyond, passing, lapse; देशकालातिपत्तौ च गृहीत्वा स्वयमर्पयेत् <ls>Y. 2. 169.</ls> {@--2@} Non-performance, failure; लिङ्निमित्ते ऌङ् क्रियातिपत्तौ <ls>P. III. 3. 139</ls> (the conditional is used instead of the potential, when the non-performance of an action is implied). {@--3@} [पत्तिं अतिक्रांतः] One surpassing a foot-soldier.
